title: Growth in Toxic players lately?
body: Has anyone noticed that there has been a growth in toxic players lately? I know it's the holidays here in Australia but seriously, where did they all come from? They just kinda blew up overnight and have been ruining every game I play ever since. It's not just me, there have been multiple posts on the boards about toxic players aswell so I'm pretty surprised to see so many toxic players.

replies.body: Stop feeding every single game and you might notice a difference???!?!?
You're a perfect example of toxic players lol, I never said anything about feeding and you automatically think I feed every single game.
There's always posts on the boards about toxic players, people just come here to b!tch about it. It's not like there was a sudden influx of toxic players, it's just become more noticed by you.

The most i give is constructive criticism but you know how the LoL community is, they take it the wrong way and think you're being "toxic" or flaming them etc...

Usually i mute if the player doesn't stop, solves everything really, but i love it when i'm recking someone and they're so salty they start insulting me calling me every name in the book, like i had this Nasus recently that i destroyed in lane and all he did was insult me, when the game was over i left a little ":)", was a good feeling.

Holidays are ending soon.

It won't much of a difference tbh, but sure it's a bonus.

just mute them immediately like I do. one word negative and muted. makes for a better game. I don't troll or attack people myself even though I feel like it sometimes so that probably helps by not getting involved.
